headers.subject: [PHP-DOC] Typo encountered!
headers.received-spf: pass (pb1.pair.com: domain googlemail.com designates 209.85.160.42 as permitted sender)

body.para: I've found a typo in faq/installation.xml, in line 287, where "but when I to access" should be replaced with "but when I *try* to access". On the other hand, on the same file, in line 265, Apache appears with the first "a" in lowercase. I think it should also be replaced, but I don't know if i'm right. Please take a look at this.
